reviewtext: My biggest problem is the SO keeps borrowing this when she takes conference calls at home.OK - second problem. Now I have a USB headset for skype/etc, and a wired headset for cell phones and when traveling (I usually don't bring the USB headset - too fragile). So now my nest of wires has gotten a little worse. Generally I don't like the quality/reliability of bluetooth, but I may try again in the next few months.
